name: mikroe.click.pressure17
short_description: Pressure 17 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a board-mount pressure sensor. This board features the BM1390GLV-Z, a high-precision piezoresistive pressure sensor from Rohm Semiconductor. The BM1390GLV-Z comes with a configurable host interface that supports I2C serial communication and measures pressure in a range from 300hPa up to 1300hPa with an accuracy of Â±1hPa.
